##Question 2
```{r}
minMaxNormalization <- function(data, min, max) {
  dataMax <- max(data)
  dataMin<-min(data)
  
  ((data-dataMin)/(dataMax-dataMin))*(max-min)+min
}

test <- c(4,6,1,3,8,5)
minMaxNormalization(data=test, min=0, max=1)
minMaxNormalization(data=test, min=2,max=4)
```
